definitions.meaning: model (particular version of a manufactured article)

sentences.pinyin: Zhè shì wǒ xīn shǒujī de xíng hào.
sentences.translation: This is the model number of my new mobile phone.

sentences.simplifiedText: 我走进手机店，比较了不同的型号，最后选择了我最喜欢的那款。
sentences.traditionalText: 我走進手機店，比較了不同的型號，最後選擇了我最喜歡的那款。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ zǒu jìn shǒujī diàn, bǐjiàole bùtóng de xíng hào, zuìhòu xuǎnzéle wǒ zuì xǐhuān de nà kuǎn.
sentences.translation: I walked into the mobile phone store, compared different models, and finally chose the one I liked the most.
